Exposure to Virus, Sickness, or Chemical: The shota, along with the rest of his boy daycare classmates his age, is affected by an unknown agent. Whether a virus, sickness, or chemical, the exposure leaves him and his classmates an inch tall with no one to rely on but the female daycare staff and/or their female relatives.

In the middle of the night, a suspicious car pulled up an alleyway next to the nearest bus stop. A dark figure stepped out of the car and carefully placed a small box near the opening of the alleyway then retreated into the vehicle and beat a hasty retreat. As the car’s tires squeaked and rolled away from the alley, a sound like a baby crying cake from the inside of the box.

As it turned out, it was a baby... A tiny baby boy the size of a small thumb tucked away in the box lined with cotton fibers and a blanket to keep him warm. At the back of the box, there was a note that said, “This is Benny. He was born this way. Please give to a good home.”

It was at midnight that tiny Benny, a baby who would grow to have a cute face and short black hair, was abandoned by the people who was supposed to love him the most. Who finds him at which time of the next day to provide him that love and a good home?

The next day, Angela walked back to work, her pace jiggling her boobs, rocking the tiny box with her new baby boy Benny sleeping inside. She was at a crossroads earlier, debating whether or not to bring Benny to XXX Bombshells seeing as how he was a baby and a minor. Unfortunately, she didn’t trust anyone in her apartment to look after him, not even her landlady. So she resorted to risk breaking the law by bringing the tiny boy along and explaining the situation to the girls and her manager.

She entered through the rear entrance where it was an easier access to the dressing room. When she entered the dressing room, five of her “girls” -all young women who were younger than 35 that she personally taught and trained in stripping and dancing- were all getting ready for their graveyard shift.

Among them was Tierra, a 32 year-old African American woman with chocolate skin, long, wavy black hair, an hourglass figure, and thick, jiggling boobs and glutes; Sofia, a 28 year-old Latina woman with a beautiful face, a slightly thick figure with C cup breasts; Emily, a 25 year-old cute redhead who lacked the curves of her fellow dancers but more than made up for in her flexibility and hypnotic dance moves; Julia, a beautiful and sexy 27 year-old brunette whose hair, boobs, and glutes were second to Tierra’s; and Mary, a sexy 35 year-old blonde who was ditzy and sometimes oblivious, but not when it came to strip dancing.

“Look who decided to show up an hour early,” greeted Tierra, watching her mentor enter the room through the mirror while applying her mascara. “What’s wrong, Mama? Has the rent been raised by a dollar?”

“No, I came in early to see if Meryl is here,” Angela answered.

“Then you’re out of luck because Meryl just went out a minute ago,” said Sofia.

“Dammit,” Angela cursed. “Well, there’s no other way around it. Girls, could you come around, please? I need to show you all something.” The other five strippers gathered around Angela as she gently fished the little object from her cleavage. She held out the little box in the palm of her hand and showed the tiny baby inside, who yawned.

“Aaaaaawwwwww!” The strippers all exclaimed, their hearts melted by his cuteness.

“He’s so adorable!” Emily observed.

“What’s his name?” Julia asked.

“His name is Benny. That’s what it said on the note, anyway,” Angela answered.

“Where did you get him from?” Mary asked.

“I found him in that box lying in the street,” Angela explained. “There was no one else to come to his rescue, so I took him home with me.”

“You mean he was abandoned?” asked Mary.

“Oh, you poor thing,” Sofia cooed sadly, gently rubbing his face with her finger. “Don’t you worry because your new Mama is gonna take care of you. And we’ll help take of you too, isn’t that right, girls?”

All the other girls agreed on the spot.

“But I’m not sure if we can,” a concerned Angela said. “This is why I have to take this up with Meryl and see if she is onboard with me taking care of Benny. This isn’t exactly an appropriate environment for children like him, you know, and I can’t ask anyone in my apartment to watch over him.”

“Well, what if one of us take care of him for you?” Emily suggested.

“Yeah, or we can all pitch in and take turns bringing him to our own home,” Mary pitched in her idea.

“Even if the strip club is no place to raise a tiny child like Benny, we can still find a way to raise him like our own,” Tierra stated.

“Thanks, girls, I appreciate you all trying to help, but...” Angela looked down at the tiny boy resting in her palm, “...he’s already seen me as his Mama, and I promised to take care of him. If I don’t do something to help him, then I don’t know what to do next.”

The door knocked, and in walked a woman older than Angela herself. She was a sexy 60 year-old GILF whose slightly complexion and slim figure had not been altered by time or medical science. Her short hair was pixie cut and parted towards the right side of her face.

“Places, girls, this is gonna be a busy night,” Meryl, the manager and owner of the strip coin said before finally noticing the newer arrival. “Oh, Angela, you’re here early. Is there something I can help you with...?”

Meryl’s eyes widened at the sight of the tiny baby boy sleeping in the soft palms of her oldest employee. She couldn’t help but gasp and cover her mouth in shock as she took a step back. “What is that..?”

“Meryl, you and I need to discuss something,” Angela said with urgency.

14.content:
A normal-sized but lonely shota accidentally finds a way to transport himself into another world where everything is big and the women are bigger.

What kind of world is it is he transported into?

A Science Fiction World: A world where everything is science fiction, including but not limited to space travel, space colonies, and extraterrestrial life. The shota will travel to different planets and civilizations where, all while he has to survive in his tiny size.

A Fantasy Realm: The shota transports himself into a magical realm through a ritual he found on the Internet and enacts it. He is in a different realm set in different kingdoms, an enchanted forest, or a tribe populated with giant females, including monsters, demi-humans, anthros, witches and sorceresses, etc. (The shota is still normal-sized, but he might be transported to a tribe of giantesses).

A Different Era in Time: The shota transports himself into a different era in the past, from ancient civilizations like Rome, Egypt, and South America, to rising civilizations such as England and America (like the Revolutionary War, the Wild West, etc.).

-or-

A Bigger Parallel Universe: The shota transports himself into a parallel universe where his counterpart isn’t born but everyone and everything else is bigger, including his friends and family. However, the parallel universe could also be home to a new world order where the giantesses dominate the tiny males, or another world where no males exist, or however you want it to be.

Syrus has a crush on leading female Obelisk Blue student, Alexis Rhodes, and other pretty Duel Monsters like the Dark Magician Girl, Gamble Angel Bunny, and Thunder Nyan Nyan.

Jesse Anderson: One of Jaden’s important friends and allies from North Academy who shares the ability to communicate with the Duel Monster Spirits, more commonly with his Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle. In the second half of the third season of Yu-Gi-Oh! GX, Jesse is captured by a crazed Yubel and possessed by her until Jaden sets him free.
1513512.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX

1513513.content:
Who in Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D’s will be the lucky shota?

Yusei, Jack, and/or Crow: Three of the main protagonists of Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D’s. Orphaned during Zero Reverse, Yusei, Jack, and Crow we’re raised by their foster mother, Martha in the slum-like island of the Satellite. The three boys were separated by circumstance and later reunited into three of the central members of the Signers.

Leo: The young twin brother of Luna, a girl who can communicate with the Duel Monsters Spirits. Leo is an eccentric boy who loves to Duel and later became a Signer after protecting Luna from harm. Luna often shrugs off most of his energetic antics.

Toby: The younger brother of Misty, the famous clairvoyant supermodel. Toby aspires to be like Akiza, the infamous Psychic Duelist also known as the Black Rose. In Yu- Gi-Oh! 5D’s, Toby lost his life to cruel experiments conducted by Sayer and was used to frame Akiza for her destructive psychic powers, which sent Misty over the edge and become reborn as a Dark Signer.

Lester/Young Aporia. One of the main antagonists of the second half of Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D’s. As a boy, Aporia lost his parents in the Meklord Emperor Genocide. After death, Aporia’s consciousness was transferred into an android body named Lester whose appearance takes after his younger self.

15321.content:
For The Legend of Zelda series, we focus on Link, the main protagonist of the famed video game series renowned for his heroic deeds who rescues Princess Zelda, destroys a looming evil threat, and saves the land of Hyrule or worlds beyond.

Link has often appeared as a young boy or a young teen in most games except for Twilight Princess, Skyward Sword, Breath of the Wild, and Hyrule Warriors, but we can have them appear as young boys or de-age them into boys less than fifteen years old.

So which incarnation of Link can we follow?

The Hero of Time

The Hero of Twilight

The Hero of Winds

-or-

The Hero of the Wild
15321.title: Link

153211.content:
This incarnation of Link is the protagonist of both Ocarina of Time and Majora’s Mask.

Young Link was thrust into preserving the safety of the world at Young Zelda’s request where Ganondorf threatened to dominate the land of Hyrule. After pulling out the Master Sword, Young Link was sealed away for seven years, during which time Ganondorf ruled the world. Link assembled the Sages, rescued Princess Zelda, and defeated Ganondorf, thus saving the world. However, the cost of his heroic deeds was that Link was sent back in time to prevent Ganondorf from carrying out his evil plans.

Some time after, Link rode horseback into the Lost Woods to find his guardian fairy, Navi, who left Link’s side after his adventures through time. There, he is robbed by a Skull Kid and his two fairy companions, Tatl and Tael, wearing the evil hexing relic, Majora’s Mask. Link is transformed by Skull Kid into a Deku Scrub and followed the imp into the alternate world of Termina where it is doomed to be destroyed by a falling moon in three days. By the request of the mysterious Happy Mask Salesman and Tael, Link and Tatl travel through Termina to free the Four Giants from captivity, defeat Skull Kid, and save the world.

After Majora’s Mask, the rest of Link’s life was shrouded by mystery, until it was revealed that he lingered on as the Hero’s Shadow in Twilight Princess because he heavily regretted that he couldn’t pass on his skills with a sword in his time.

Despite only appearing in only a couple of canon Zelda games, the young Hero of Time has also appeared in other non-canonical games such as Hyrule Warriors and the Super Smash Bros. series (but the latter is in a different route altogether).

Which of these games should be the main setting of the story?

15422.content: Is the focus shota from DC Comics a canon character or an original character?
15422.title: DC Comics

154222.content:
Choose these scenarios then...

Timmy Walker - An eight year-old boy who was on a flight with his family over the Bermuda Triangle when a strange lightning storm blew the engine. The strange electromagnetic pulses shrunk him right before the lightning struck the window and he was sucked out of his seat and into the sea before the plane landed in the sea. He washed up on the shores of Themyscira, home of the Amazons and Wonder Woman!

Aiden Jones - A boy who was born to two STAR Lab employees whose combined exposures to chemicals and strange radiation resulted in him being born tiny. As a baby, he is kidnapped by his nanny, actually an infamous villainess and is raised in isolation (possibly with a group of villainesses) to test his durability and twist him into something tiny but evil. His future as either a hero or villain is ambiguous.

Peyton - A nine year-old borrower who survives by borrowing any discarded object from the homes of other people. One night, he goes off scavenging for discarded trash or food in the house of one female DC character and is either trapped in that house or discovered.

-or-

Jacob “Jake” McFly - A troubled eleven year-old delinquent who takes to snatching on the streets. During a museum tour in the Hall of Justice, Jacob decides to sell a few of the Justice League’s trophies on the black market, which includes Atomica’s malfunctioning shrinking belt. That night, Jacob snatches a few of the trophies and tries on the belt to escape the female members of the Justice League, but he is permanently shrunk. He is either caught and at the mercy of the Justice League giantesses, or he escapes but is sought by the giant villainesses.
154222.title: Non-Canon

1542221.content:
Eight year-old Timmy Walker was on a flight from Florida to Italy when everything changed. After the airplane flew through the Bermuda Triangle, the plane was subjected to the intense electromagnetic storms where the compasses and the controls went haywire. The intense electromagnetic pulses also activated Timmy’s metagene, causing him to shrink permanently to an inch tall, much to the shock of his mother sitting next to him.

As the helpless shrunken boy turned to his now-giant mother for help, great bolts of lightning struck the plane, one striking the engine and the other striking the window where Timmy sat. The engine exploded from the lightning strike and the destroyed window caused people to scream and feel the intense suction of the cabin pressure vacuumed out of the window. Timmy screamed and cried for his mommy as he was whisked away outside of the plane, falling to his watery grave while the rest of the people on the plane crash landed into the Atlantic too.

As the tiny boy crashed into the ocean, between his new tiny size and the ocean’s turbulence and pressure, Timmy struggled to swim up to the surface. Even with all of his swimming strengths, Timmy eventually succumbed to fatigue in his struggles and eventually lost consciousness. Before he blacked out, he swore he saw feminine shapes in the water swimming towards him.

When Timmy woke up, he suddenly found himself gagging all of the salt water out of his lungs. After hacking up the last of the salt water, Timmy looked around and saw he landed on a beach, now a hundred times bigger since his unprecedented shrinkage on the place. When he turned, he saw that he was...
1542221.title: Timmy Walker

15422212.content:
Timmy sat on his behind, taking in the sights of this tropical Brobdingnagian island. Everything was gigantic to him now. He could never find a way to grow back to his normal size. And what’s worse, he lost his family. His big brother, his dad... even his mommy. As soon as that thought crossed his mind, Timmy curled up in a fetal position and began to cry. He was alone. No one would want to take care of him now. He was a bug, an insignificant insect who survived a horrific plane crash and drowning, but he was alone in the world.

As Timmy continued to cry over everything that happened to him and everything happening to him now, he heard the distinguishable sounds of footsteps on the beach. As a tiny child, Timmy could now feel those footsteps approaching his location. He turned to see in both awe and shock, the shape of a giant woman walking towards where he washed up to.

But this was no ordinary woman... the garb she wore was Greek in origin.

This was...
15422212.title: Not Alone

154222121.content: To be clear, is this Diana of Themyscira before or after she donned the mantle of Wonder Woman?
154222121.title: Diana/Wonder Woman

choices: Hitch a Ride On Their Sandals
One of the Amazons Spots Him
The Amazons March Away Without Him
154222123.content:
...an Amazonian soldier.

Timmy recognizes the designs of the armor. He recognized their spears, their swords, and their glorious shields. Timmy’s mommy told him bedtime stories about the legends of the Greek Amazons, their home island on Themyscira, and their queen, Hippolyta. He was elated to hear that the island was the home of their princess, Diana, the world-renowned superheroine, Wonder Woman.

Timmy always wanted to visit Themyscira and meet the Amazons himself, but the island/country of Themyscira had a strict rule about men setting foot on the island. This rule also stemmed down to little boys, too. Personally, he had every right to be frightened about this than he was now. First of all, the Amazons were strict and absolute. They followed their duty down to a T. Anyone with an XY chromosome (except for a few exceptions) would either be captured, kept prisoner, or be brought back to the World of Man.

The other reason is that Timmy was so small, the giantesses didn’t even see him on the ground. The lead soldier, a black woman unknowingly marched towards Timmy’s position, trailed by a few others. Her sandaled foot raised in the air to take another step, right on top of Timmy. The boy screamed as he rolled away before the sandaled foot fell on that spot, watching the deep foot-shaped impression pressed into the sand.

Then Timmy looked back and did the same thing with the oncoming giant feet, rolling away and yelping while avoiding from being flattened under the soles of the giant Amazonian warriors.

“This is a waste of our time,” addressed the redheaded giantess, Artemis of the Bana-Mighdall. “Whoever the man Menalippe spoke of to our queen would not dare wish to remain on the island without invoking the Amazon’s wrath.”

The leading armored black woman and turned to the impatient Amazon. “Be still your tongue and your impatience, Artemis,” General Phillipus ordered firmly. “Menalippe has never led us astray with her clairvoyance. She spoke of a son of Man’s World would wash upon the shores of Themiscyra, so our orders are to find this son and report him to the queen without prejudice.”

Artemis scoffed. “Fine. So if this son of Man’s World is here, then where has he ended up?”

“Perhaps he has wandered off into the forest?” Phillipus guessed. “Any son from Man’s World would be curious... or foolish enough to enter the forest without knowing what creatures lurk within the trees.”

“If he did, then we would see fresh tracks leading into the woods.”

While the Amazons debated the skepticism of the predictions of their fellow Amazonian oracle, unbeknownst to them at their feet, Timmy watched and listened to it all. He didn’t understand what an oracle was, or why they were looking for him. Maybe it was because he washed up on shore. As he was an eight year-old boy, Timmy first figured that him being there meant he would be subjected to the Amazons’ harsh treatment.

At his size, the Amazons wouldn’t even try to treat him badly! Maybe they’d squish him underneath their feet, swallow him hole, or do whatever torturous methods ran through his thoughts. At that point, Timmy knew what he had to do.
154222123.title: A Group of Amazon Soldiers

choices: ...in the sand. He’s about to be stepped on by the Amazon soldiers!
...in the sand. He’s about to get scooped into Artemis’s sandal!
...in a basket of freshly-cleaned laundry carried into the city!
1542221233.content:
Timmy was unsure of himself about this decision, but he figured that this was the only way he could get to the queen of Themyscira. Without them spotting, the tiny boy made his way to the nearest pair of feet with leather sandals firmly strapped to them.

The fierce redhead Amazon, Artemis was the closest one that Timmy could get to. So the boy reached the sandal-clad foot of one of Themyscira’s most formidable warriors. Her sole emanated a certain fruity, coconut-y scent. She must take special care of her feet while in the shower, Timmy figured.

His timing couldn’t be any more impeccable because as soon as he reached Artemis’s left foot, Philippus up above ordered her troops to move. Timmy barely had time to hold on tight when Artemis’s left foot rose up and fell in a march. Each rise and fall was as scary as the last. It was like holding on the side of a roller coaster: a dangerous, adrenaline-pumping experience which made Timmy scream.

After one certain turn to the right, Artemis unknowingly flung the one-inch boy with her foot. The fling sent Timmy at a maximum height of nearly ten stories, which was like up to the knees Amazons. Timmy screamed the whole way as he flew a great distance into nowhere. All of a sudden, he landed on something soft. The softness cushioned his fall, but he didn’t know where he landed. Getting flung by Artemis disoriented him temporarily.

Timmy shook his head and realized he was...
1542221233.title: Hitch a Ride On Their Sandals

choices: “There is something in my shoe. I need to check it out.”
“There is something in my shoe. But it’s nothing, I’m sure.”
15422212333.content:
By some stroke of luck, Timmy managed to land back onto the sand unharmed; however, his luck immediately turned its head when he saw he hadn’t landed far.

The small legion of Amazon giantesses passed him by. Timmy yelped when he saw and immediately jumped out of the way of a blonde Amazons’ sandaled foot. The foot landed just as the tiny eight year-old landed headfirst in a small pile of sand. He managed to shake his way out of the sand, but for a split second, he completely forgot to take into account the giantess whose sandal he hitched onto was literally a step behind him.

Just as Timmy heard one of her footsteps from behind him, he and the pile of sand was suddenly scooped up by a flat, leathery surface. Timmy felt like he was on a slide for just a split surface just before he felt a soft but immense amount of pressure on his back, wedging him between two giant feminine digits. With it, Timmy was held tight between two of Artemis’s goes and forcibly, unknowingly, and unwillingly carried along for the rough ride.

The scent of that fruity and coconut-y was stronger here. The power of Artemis’s toes clenched the boy between the big toe and the index toe. Timmy screamed as he was subjected to an intensely scary front row seat to the rise and fall of Artemis’s foot without anything else to safely strap himself in. The toes loosened slightly with every rise and then they clenched tightly with every fall. The impact knocked Timmy around a little, enough to disorient him and give him a dizzying headache.

Of course, Timmy wasn’t the only one who felt he was knocking around with each footfall. Not long after her debate with Phillipus, Artemis was only several steps into the March when she felt something irritating her left foot. With each step, she felt something in between two of her clenching toes and opted to do something about it. She decided to wriggle her toes, manipulate her digits to push away the tiny obstruction between her foot and her sandal.

Unbeknownst to her, she made a one-inch young boy suffer through it all. The tiny eight year old screamed as suddenly, midway throughout the walk from hell, the giantess wriggled her toes on top of him. The two toes that trapped him smothered Timmy’s tiny body underneath the powerful digits. The five titanic toes squished him against the sandal’s flat. With each little wriggle, Timmy ended up getting squishing him further and further down and deeper underneath the soft and scented sole. Out of desperation, the crying tiny boy beat against the skin of the foot and hit right into it.

Artemis suddenly grunted at the sharp pain underneath her foot. Perhaps she accidentally picked up a biting ant in her sandal? She wriggled the ball of her foot and pressed it harder against the obstruction in her sandal. It was really wriggling underneath her foot. It felt rather nice, if Artemis was being honest with herself, but it was getting in the way of her march. She stopped her march to loosen up her foot from her sandal and tapped the toe section to force the little bug out.

Sending her discomfort, Philippus halted her company and turned to the high-ranking red-haired Amazon foolishly staying behind just to adjust her foot.

“There had better be a reason for you to be falling out of rank, Artemis,” the general addressed her, to which Artemis replied...
15422212333.title: Tiny Timmy Trapped ‘Tween the Titaness’s Toes

choices: Timmy decided to stay in the sack
Timmy decided to escape the sack
154222123331.content:
“There is something in my shoe. I need to check it out.”

The fierce and suspicious Artemis lifted her foot up and held it sideways. By squeezing the leather sandal, Artemis was able to create an opening between the flat and the underside of her foot so the little bug that bit her would roll out and into her open palm.

Timmy, on the other hand, recently experienced neck-breaking vertigo when Artemis tapped her toe section, trying to force him out from under her foot. Thanks to the soft yet firm hold of Artemis’s foot skin, the tiny eight year-old was kept from being thrown out into the sand and possibly stomped on by the giantess. In the midst of being battered, bruised, and disoriented by the ignorant giantess’s feet, Timmy felt the urge to puke from the intense dizziness. Even that didn’t stop him from feeling everything rise up and turn on its side. All of a sudden, the squeezing pressure between her foot and the sandal suddenly gaped open as Timmy felt himself sliding backwards then rolling from underneath the ball, the overbearing toes, and then into the soft, calloused hand of the giantess who unknowingly tormented him.

Timmy coughed and sputtered as the palm he crouched on was lifted to the level of the stern green eyes of the fierce Amazonian warrior. As soon as the tiny boy looked into those giant, seemingly hostile eyes, the boy screamed and curled in a fetal position, turning away from Artemis’s gaze.

“Please don’t hurt me!” Timmy cried as the other gigantic Amazonian soldiers marched up to him and Artemis.

“Artemis, what is that in your hand?” Philippus demanded to know.

“Apparently, I found the fabled son of Man’s World, but he is nothing more now than a bug that found its way into my shoe,” Artemis answered, holding the scared one-inch boy out to Philippus and the other Amazons to see.

“This is an unusual development,” the blonde Amazon, Persephone said. “All children shouldn’t be so small, they’d have to fit inside an Amazon’s shoe.”

“If he truly is the son of Man’s World, then we must report him to the queen at once,” Philippus reminded her troops about the mission. She then extended her palm to the red-haired Amazon. “Artemis, please give him to me so we can ensure him safe escort. Being trapped under your foot seems to have scared him to death.”

Artemis didn’t hesitate to answer. “As you wish,” she said, dumping the suddenly surprised boy into Philippus’s awaiting hand, “but only because I don’t want him biting any part of my body again.”

Timmy tumbled around the darker giantess’s palm, barely having any time to get up as she gently curled her fingers and trapped him in her fist. “Forgive me, child, but the queen has ordered us to take you to her personally,” Philippus said, reaching for a small drawstring sack on her belt, “and this is the only way for me to safely escort you.”

Philippus moves the boy between her fingers, pinched his shirt between three of her fingers and her thumb, and dangled him over the opening of the sack. Timmy screamed and wriggled in the grip as the giant chocolate digits held him over the yawning abyss of the sack’s opening; he was terrified of the dark. The screams got louder as Philippus powered him down into the opening.

“NOOOO!!! Please don’t put in there! I’ll be good, I promise, just don’t put me in there!”

But Philippus didn’t listen. She gently inserted the tiny screaming boy into the sack, and by loosening her fingers, she felt the boy fall to the bottom. She then drew the drawstring close and tight, leaving the opening slightly ajar to let in air for her bite-sized prisoner. With a simple command, Philippus and her troops marched for the queen’s palace in the city.

Within the sack on Philippus’s thigh, Timmy was once again subjected to motions of a giantess’s march. It wasn’t as bad as getting trapped underneath Artemis’s scented feet in her sandal, but he was still getting motion sickness from this experience. What’s worse is that now that he was discovered, he’d be taken to the queen. She would probably keep him for a slave or a toy for torment! She’d lock him in a cage somewhere dark and damp with very little light to reach him. At the very least, she’d send him back to Man’s World with nothing and no one to look after him. Whatever the queen decided, it would change his very life.

Whatever the case was...
154222123331.title: Found Under Foot

choices: Timmy is allowed to stay under Hippolyta’s care
Timmy is allowed to stay under another Amazon’s care
Timmy cannot stay; Hippolyta calls on Wonder Woman
Timmy cannot stay; Hippolyta calls on another Amazon
Timmy cannot stay; Hippolyta calls on herself
1542221233311.content:
Timmy decided to stay in the sack and await his fate. The opening of the drawstring sack was too high and too steep to reach, and the movements of his gigantic captor was making staying in one place difficult. Even if he did attempt an escape, Timmy would most likely be spotted by the giant Amazons and quickly be recaptured. As best as he could, he curled up in the bottom of the savor and felt the motions of Philippus’s thigh rock him gently.

When at last, after his giant captor finally stopped did Timmy feel a primal fear lodge in his throat. The small legion of giantesses finally made it into the palace. Timmy could only curl up and listen as the dark-skinned addressed the high royalty outside the sack.

“My queen, we have found and brought the son of Man’s World to you, as you ordered,” Philippus reported to Queen Hippolyta, ruler of the Amazons.

“You have brought me news of your capture, general, yet I do not see him with you,” Queen Hippolyta observed. “Tell me, where have you taken the son of Man’s World when I have specifically ordered you to bring him to me directly?”

“My Queen, there has been an... unexpected development.” Timmy flinched as daylight broke into the bag the same instance the drawstring was loosened. He barely had time to adjust to the brightness, but from the light, a giant ebony hand with five imposing fingers curled up around him, enveloping him all around in soft flesh. Then he felt the hand lift him out of the confines of the sack, turn him over onto her palm, and felt the fingers loosen and spread out, revealing him to the outside world... to the regal, brunette giantess staring down at him from the throne with a bewildered look.

“This is indeed unexpected,” Hippolyta concurred. “I would never expect a child from Man’s World to be small.”

“He was like this when we found him, highness,” Philippus reported. “He was like this battered and terrified after he endured much torment when he slipped inside of Artemis’s shoe.”

Philippus turned her gaze to Artemis, who stood at attention and bowed her head. “I beg your forgiveness, your highness. I nearly mistook him for a bug under my foot.”

“There is no need to apologize for what you have done, Artemis. I, too, would not have known this child from a bug if it had slipped into my shoe,” Hippolyta said as she descended from her throne, turning to the tiny eight year-old shuddering in the palm of her general.

“And now for the matter at hand, so to speak,” Hippolyta addressed, approaching the fearful boy. You are a lost child, are you not? You are lost and terrified because the cruel hand of fate has shrunken you, hasn’t it? There is no reason for you to fear because I promise no harm may come to youwhile under my charge. Do you understand, child?”

Timmy nodded, whimpering.

“Good. Now then, can you please tell me your name?” Hippolyta asked as though she was addressing her daughter when she was the boy’s age.

“T-Timmy, your majesty. T-Timmy Walker,” the bite-sized boy answered.

“It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Timmy Walker. I am Hippolyta, queen of the Amazons and ruler of Themyscira,” the queen introduced herself. Hippolyta held her hand out, and Philippus gently ramped her hand to nudge Timmy to walk onto the awaiting palm. “Can you tell me where you are from and how you came to be this way?”

Timmy sniffled and stifled the urge to cry. “I-I’m from Florida, your majesty. I-I was flying with my family over the ocean to Italy when... when... when a scary storm hit the plane! I don’t know what happened, but I shrunk to this size and I was sucked out of the plane! I fell into the water and I tried to swim but I was so tired, I couldn’t swim anymore! Then I woke up on the beach all alone and... and...”

Timmy couldn’t hold back the urge to cry as he buried his face in his hands. “They’re gone! They’re gone and I can never see them again! I’ll never see my big brothers again! I’ll never see my daddy again! I’ll never see my mommy again!”

While Timmy wept in the queen’s hand, keeling over letting tears flow from his eyes, Hippolyta couldn’t help but feel pity for the poor boy. With her other hand, she gently stroked Timmy’s back like a lost bird trapped in the rain and in need of shelter. “I am sorry, little one. This is a fate you did not deserve to suffer from. I can never imagine the pain of your loss and the terror of being so small compared to the rest of the world.”

Timmy sniffled and choked. “I miss them so much!”

“Your majesty,” Philippus spoke up. “I do not wish to sound insensitive, but what are we supposed to do with the boy? You know as well as anyone else that our sacred law dictates that no man may set foot onto the shores of Themyscira, and despite being a child, he is nonetheless the son of man.”

Hippolyta had taken this to consideration when Menalippe, the oracle, foresaw Timmy’s arrival. However, since she discovered that Timmy is shrunken and devastated in the palm of her hand, things have changed in the snap of the finger. After careful consideration, Hippolyta gave a deep sigh.

“I have made my decision...” she stated...
1542221233311.title: Before the Queen

choices: ...on the floor. “I want you to massage my feet.”
...onto the nightstand. “I want you to feed me the fruit in that bowl.”
15422212333111.content:
“From this day forth, young Timmy Walker of Florida shall be allowed to stay on the shores of Themyscira under my own guardianship and protection,” Hippolyta decreed to her guards. They, and the tiny boy in her palm turned to her with collected shock.

“But your highness, you cannot possibly mean this!” Philippus immediately protested. “This is a direct violation of Aphrodite’s Law! If you allow the son of man to walk on the same ground as the Amazons, then you will bring the wrath of the gods down upon us!”

“True, but any man who dares sets foot on this island is to be confined and imprisoned immediately under the watchful eye of the Amazons,” Hippolyta explained, holding out Timmy sitting in her cupped palms. “This child may be a son of man, but he poses no threat for his age and size. Therefore, with no one else to watch over him, we Amazons must perform our duties to nurture and encourage the growth of our children, whether they grow up to be a man or not.”

“But your majesty...”

“That is enough, Philippus,” Hippolyta interjected, raising her hand. “I have made my decision. I will be in my chambers to accommodate this child personally teach him the ways of our people. You have served me well in bringing the boy here to me, though under abnormal circumstances. You may return to your duties.”

“Yes, your majesty,” Philippus said, bowing her head. She and her fellow Amazonian soldiers marched out of the throne room, Artemis being the last one to stay behind and give Timmy a sideways glare. Timmy sucked behind the queen’s monolithic fingers, but he was immediately comforted by another set of giant fingers resting on top of his back. With it, Artemis turned and marched out of the throne room.

“She’s scary,” Timmy said meekly, making a Hippolyta chuckle.

“It is natural that she is intimidating. After all, she’s the fiercest warrior among us now,” she said, gently stroking her new charge’s back as she walked back to her chambers. “Now, Timmy, I want you to understand that as long as you are here, you are to become my personal servant and pet bound to me by law. I cannot guarantee that the tasks before you will be easy, but you must prove you are worthy of being under my charge to my sisters. Otherwise, by law, you will be forced off the island by way of the sea.”

The very thought of drifting back in that dangerous, turbulent sea made Timmy’s blood freeze. “No! I’ll be good, your majesty! I’ll do my best to do whatever you want!”

“Very good,” Hippolyta acknowledged as she entered her chambers, “because your basic training is about to begin.”

Hippolyta settled into her bed, a small table standing next to it with a bowl full of fruit, mostly grapes. “Now then, Timmy, for your first task...” she said, guiding the little boy in her hands...
15422212333111.title: Timmy’s Guardian Queen

choices: Hippolyta asks Timmy about his mom.
Hippolyta asks Timmy about his experience with Artemis.
They are interrupted by an Amazon!
154222123331111.content:
“Now then, Timmy, for your first task,” she said, guiding the little boy in her hands to the floor, “I want you to massage my feet.”

Hippolyta lowered the boy with cupped hands to the floor, tilting them to prompt Timmy to hop off and stand before the foot of the queen. To Timmy, the queen’s imposing size made her look like a goddess, like the one he’s seen statues of on the way. Like them, she stood tall like a monolith, dressed in a long, fuchsia-colored toga. Slipping from that elegant toga was a pair of giant, beautifully-maintained feet clad in leather sandals. She gently lowered them before her new young charge, but to Timmy, he could feel the tremor as she daintily slapped them on the floor.

Timmy felt a certain overwhelming fear as he was presented his first task of massaging the queen’s feet. The toes alone were just as big as him, almost a little bigger, but they were still threatening. He couldn’t erase the traumatic moment when he was kicked around and crushed under Artemis’s feet from his mind. Just being next to a giant foot gave him certain pause.

“I understand your reluctance to carry out the task, little one,” Hippolyta said, “but please know you will be seeing this a lot during your stay here at Themyscira. This is part of your training as my personal servant, so you must learn to face your fears.”

“But... but I’m scared of going inside your sandal,” Timmy said.

“Here. Allow me to make it easier for you.”

Hippolyta lifted one leg up, unstrapped her sandal, and set it back down to the floor bare. She then proceeded to the same thing with the other foot. With both feet bare and touching the cool textile floor, Hippolyta lifted both feet up by the heel, scrunching her toes.

“There. This should make things easier to perform your tasks,” the Queen of the Amazons said, setting her feet fully flat to the floor, “but remember this, little one: someday, you will have to unstrap my sandals yourself, but it will only happen if you are willing to continue your training.”

“I-I’ll try my hardest, your majesty,” Timmy answered nervously.

“That’s what I expect from you, my young charge,” acknowledged Hippolyta, “and speaking of expectations, I am still waiting for that massage I ordered a little while ago.” Hippolyta slid her feet forwards towards Timmy, her toes slightly wriggling with anticipation.

Taking a deep breath, Timmy bent down and started to rub his hands on Hippolyta’s giant toes, starting with the big toe. The giantess’s digits wriggled at the ticklish sensation, making the tiny boy recoil a bit. Nevertheless, he had a moral obligation to fulfill his first duty and he had to do it. Bending gown into a squat, Timmy pressed his hands into the skin of the toe and gently squeezed into the soft, smooth flesh. He worked his squeezing grip around the smooth skin of the foot like he was kneading dough for bread.

Although, for this particular knead, Timmy wasn’t making bread, though Hippolyta’s feet smelled similar to bread. Gently, he maneuvered his massage around the perimeter of the big toe, not missing a single inch of skin to thoroughly massage it before he moved it lower to the underside of the giantess’s digit. Sensing this, Hippolyta lifted up her toes, which allowed Timmy to easily reach the underside of her foot. The skin was softer and malleable than the rest of the foot. Timmy figured that this was where he was given a chance to show his skill as someone who watched his father give his mother a foot massage after a stressful day of work. He pressed his hands hard into the supple skin and squeezed hard.

Up above, Hippolyta three her head back and sighed in blissful content. She didn’t want to admit it, but despite the boy’s tiny size and young age, his massages felt like Elysium. While the sensations tickled a little, she could feel her muscles in her feet relax around the areas she didn’t realize where slightly stiff until Timmy worked his way around them. In her mind, she made the right choice in taking in the tiny boy as her own personal servant, technically confined to her by law, and encouraging him to fulfill his duties to her.

While Hippolyta enjoyed the feeling of her tiny charge work his way in between her toes, then eventually moving on to rubbing slow circles on the ball of her foot...
154222123331111.title: Hippolyta’s Tiny Foot Massager

choices: Timmy accidentally falls into her open mouth!
They are interrupted by another Amazon.
154222123331112.content:
“Now then, Timmy, for your first task,” Hippolyta said, guiding the little boy in her hands onto the nightstand, “I want you to feed me the fruit in that bowl.”

Hippolyta lowered the boy with cupped hands to the nightstand, tilting them to prompt Timmy to hop off and land on the surface of the small stand level to Hippolyta’s chest. The tiny boy watched as Hippolyta bent towards to be at eye level with her new charge, getting a better look at each other.

To Hippolyta, the tiny boy was so young, innocent, and adorable, but so helpless at his size. One more wrong step and he would become a stain on the bottom of an Amazon’s shoe. To Timmy, Hippolyta was the most beautiful woman he had ever seen, admittedly even more beautiful than his mom. She had the face of a caring mother about her and a lovely voice that could only be viewed as both motherly and commanding.

“This task is quite simple,” Hippolyta explained. “You will bring forward a grape for me to eat only one at a time, but be sure to not drop them anywhere except for my mouth. Given your size, I do not wish for you to strain yourself bringing two or more grapes for me. When you have finished feeding me the last grape and not drop one on the ground, you will have succeeded in your task, understood?”

“Y-yes, your highness,” Timmy answered.

Without another word, Hippolyta slumped down in her bed in her fullest graceful splendor, her head inclined on the bed’s soft pillows. She placed her hands on her breasts, closed her eyes, and opened her mouth.

Timmy took a quick moment to observe the titanic Amazonian queen lying down in her bed, the way she folded her hands over her breasts, the posture she chose... he couldn’t exactly describe the beauty behind it all. She looked like a true goddess, standing as tall as the stairs of said goddesses that Timmy noticed the statues of in the palace on the way. A goddess in need of an insignificant bug to serve on hand and foot.

“Well? I am waiting, my young charge,” Hippolyta said, snapping him out of his daze.

“Uh..! S-Sorry!” Timmy squeaked as he ran to the fruit bowl, picking out a grape, holding with both hands like a giant beach ball, and returning to the edge of the nightstand.

Timmy grabbed the grape so he could toss it into Hippolyta’s mouth. As he approached the edge, however, he found himself pausing before a curious, yet dangerous sight. He ended up staring directly into the open maw of Queen Hippolyta herself. The inside of her open mouth looked like a deep, fleshy pit, framed by her lips, her ivory teeth, and her wriggling tongue lined with moist, spongy texture. Timmy looked deeper inside the giantess’s maw and saw the back of her throat, the gateway to her esophagus, a dark squelching tunnel that led to the inside of her stomach, marked overhead by her bobbing uvula.

Timmy felt a shiver run through his body; he was old enough to know what happened when food was eaten and ends up in his stomach. Remembering his task, Timmy tossed down the first grape onto Hippolyta’s tongue. The instant the grape hit her taste buds, Hippolyta quickly sealed her lips shut, bringing the grape to her molars and compressing it with a crunch.

Timmy watched with fascination as the giantess’s jaws made quick work of the grape. He could hear every juicy crunch with each motion of her jaws, and her deep, nasally breathing to accompany the music of her mastication. After a few seconds, the giantess swallowed, her neck bobbing inward to send the crushed remains of the grape down to her stomach while her mouth opened for more.

For the next several grapes, Timmy repeated this routine, sending the fruit into Hippolyta’s mouth to be chewed, swallowed, and digested without ever dropping one by accident. With a few more grapes left in the bunch, Timmy plucked another one to feed the giantess.

What happens then?
154222123331112.title: Hippolyta’s Tiny Fruit Feeder

1542221233311123.content:
Timmy carried his latest plucked grapes in both arms. He carried it over to the edge of the nightstand and looked over to aim the grape into the giantess’s yawning maw. In that moment, Hippolyta breathed a deep sigh, sending hot breath in the boy’s face that would eventually prove to be a major mistake.

The breath not only make Timmy grimace, but because the nightstand was made of smooth, polished marble, any hot breath would turn into moisture. The edge of the nightstand was moistened, making Timmy’s footing unstable. He slipped on the edge, and he went screaming into the dark, fleshy pit, hurtling past the gaping lips, through two rows of white ivory teeth, and over the gargantuan tongue. His fall abruptly stopped when he was lodged into Queen Hippolyta’s esophagus.

Suddenly, Hippolyta’s windpipe was clogged up like a cork in a bottle. She threw herself into a sitting position as she choked and gagged on the wriggling tiny boy in the back of her throat. The gagging was so loud, it echoed out of the chambers and immediately drew attention from her guard. Philippus and her troop stormed into the chamber, watching with fright as their queen grasped her throat, turning blue in the face.

“Your highness!” Philippus exclaimed as she ran to the queen’s side. “Quick! Someone get her some water!”

Persephone instantly ran to fetch a jug of water and a glass for the choking queen. Philippus quickly went from behind and grabbed Hippolyta around the abdomen. She quickly constricted her arms in spurts to dislodge the obstruction suffocating her from the inside. Hippolyta’s face was starting to turn purple.

“Hold on, my queen! We’ll get whatever’s choking you out!” Philippus tried to assure the queen.

The tiny boy stuck inside the back Hippolyta’s throat wasn’t faring much better. His legs were stuck inside the epiglottis where the flap separated the esophagus from the lungs. Hippolyta’s vocal chords were so close in proximity, her constant coughing and gagging seemed like explosions in his ears.

The jaws continuously jolted along with bright flickers of light pouring in from the opening of the mouth. The tongue was too moist and slippery for Timmy to grab ahold to pull himself up. His panicking overwhelmed him as he tried to claw out of the throat, but that only made it worse. The more he wriggled, the deeper he was pushed down.

“Please, your majesty, don’t eat me!” Timmy begged for his life.

Suddenly, he felt tiny bursts of air pushing him from deep inside the throat, pushing a little further up the tongue. Someone was giving her the Heimlich maneuver. They were trying to force him out of her windpipe. Timmy whimpered as he reached for the back of the tongue and tried to pull himself out of the epiglottis. Then after a few squeezes and a few pushes of the Heimlich...
1542221233311123.title: Timmy's Fall

choices: Hippolyta imprisons Timmy in her stomach.
15422212333111231.content:
The more times Hippolyta was given the Heimlich maneuver, the more times it took for Timmy to be dislodged from the giantess’s windpipe. It was working because Hippolyta was beginning to breathe inward again, though less than outward. Her faithful general of her armies kept pushing on her lungs to rescue the boy from an unfortunate digestive fate. After this was over, Hippolyta knew that this was an unfortunate circumstance, but nonetheless, she had to administer her punishment to the boy because this counted as an automatic failure.

After a few pushes from Philippus, Timmy was pushed out of the epiglottis and launched onto the back of the tongue. Timmy laid flat on the rear bumps along the edge of Hippolyta’s tongue, crying at the horrific trauma he endured. He got himself up to crawl over the tongue and out the mouth when his head his something moist from up above.

All of a sudden, the world inside of Hippolyta’s mouth and throat as her gag reflex kicked in. Timmy’s entire world jolted around him as the tongue suddenly bucked him to the back of the throat and a sudden booming gag blasted behind him.

Outside, Hippolyta began to choke once more, frightening her guard. The tiny boy hit his head on his uvula, triggering her reflex which caused her tongue to buck the obstruction back into her throat. She held her hands to her throat to slow Timmy’s accidental descent down her esophagus. No matter how much she tried, Hippolyta couldn’t resist her reflex as they threatened to pull him down into her digestive tract.

“My queen!? Don’t tell me you’re choking again!?” Philippus assumed, turning to Persephone. “Quick, give her the water now!”

“Of course!” the blonde Amazon acknowledged, quickly bringing a glass of water over to Hippolyta. “Quickly, my queen, you must drink or you will choke to death!”

Persephone took Hippolyta’s chin and quickly poured the water into her mouth. The water relaxed the constricting throat muscles, allowing it entry into her throat. With so much regret, Hippolyta could no longer resist the drink flowing down her throat, and so she swallowed. Hippolyta grimaced as her esophagus squeezed the water and the wriggling bulk inside, feeling him descend to plop into her stomach. Hippolyta quickly jumped on her feet and breathed normally, holding her belly with a shocked face.

“Your highness, are you alright?” Philippus asked.

“No. No, I’m not,” Hippolyta answered, her shock never leaving her face.

Artemis felt something was off. She looked around the room with her signature stern stare. “Wait. Something is not right. Where is the boy, your majesty?”

“I... I swallowed him,” Hippolyta answered.

All of the guards’ faces dropped in the same state of shock.

“You what!?”

Inside, Timmy had lived one of the worst experiences of his newly tiny life. He was so close to being coughed out of Hippolyta’s throat when he accidentally caused her to choke again. The tongue sent him over the edge of her throat and his entire body was stuck inside. He felt the gentle, protective hands of the giantess trying to hold him from being swallowed down until he was struck in the face by a torrent of water, enabling him to be sent deep inside her body.

After a painful five seconds down the esophagus, Timmy was squeezed into the stomach, filled up with water, acid, and a single tiny boy. After splashing in that hot, shallow pool at the bottom of the fleshy cavern, the size of the inside of a minivan, Timmy began to panic. He quickly swam up to the stomach walls, screamed, and began to beat his fists against the malleable wall.

“Please, your majesty, let me out!” Timmy screamed. “I don’t wanna be digested!”

Hippolyta felt the tiny beats in her stomach. She covered her belly with her hands while the other Amazon guards huddled around her to get a good listen. They could faintly hear the tiny screams of the boy coming from inside her belly. It sounded muffled, but it confirmed without a doubt that it was his voice.

“So it’s true,” Artemis said. “You swallowed the son of man.”

“How could this happen?” Persephone asked.

“He fell into my mouth while feeding me grapes as part of his own test,” Hippolyta explained.

“Then he has failed the test,” Artemis finished.

“It would seem so.”

“So keep him there,” the redhead suggested. “He should not have failed at such an easy task, and yet, there he resides in the belly of our queen. Surely this is a mercy for arriving at these shores as small as a bug.”

“No. I would rather have the boy alive and unspoiled than to suffer a fate worse than death,” Philippus argued with the fierce Amazon. “The boy may be the son of man, but he is still a child. You would personally forsake the life of a young one for nutrition in our queen’s body.”

“If he can endure torture at our feet, what’s makes you think he can’t endure torture in our own bellies?”

“Enough,” Hippolyta said, turning her attention to the crying minuscule boy in her stomach. “Timmy, it is I, Hippolyta. Are you okay?”

“No!” Timmy yelled from inside the Hippolyta’s stomach. “You just swallowed me, and it was so tight, I couldn’t breath. Now I’m stuck in your tummy and I can’t climb out. It’s dark and it’s gross and it’s stinky and it’s wet and... and... I want my mommy!”

“Timmy? Timmy, listen to my voice. Focus on my voice,” Hippolyta said calmly. “I need you to calm down. Panicking will only lead to disaster. I want you speak to me as calmly as you can. Are you hurt? Do you feel at least the slightest burn anywhere in your body?”

Timmy sniffled. “N-No. I’m... I’m just scared! Please, your majesty, I’m sorry for falling into your mouth! I’m sorry I almost choked you to death! Please let me out! I don’t wanna die!”

“Your majesty, please, you must allow the boy to take his punishment in your belly,” Artemis insisted. “He has set foot on the shores of Themyscira, failed at a simple task of serving you, and nearly killed you by lodging himself in your throat.”

“But he is only a child,” Philippus countered. “Children his age make mistakes, but we would never want a child to die. Though he has failed in a simple task, your highness, allow us to give him the appropriate punishment that does not involve digestion.”

Hippolyta stopped and thought this dilemma through. The boy in her stomach had indeed breached Themyscira, but he was a lonely survivor of a fatal plane crash the size of a bug. Even if he did fail to carry out her test to the end, she would not want him to suffer a grim fate inside her body... but then again, he survived Artemis’s toes and doesn’t feel pain of digestion.

“I have made my decision,” Hippolyta said, turning to her stomach and rubbing it gently in circles. “Timmy, I have made up my decision...”
15422212333111231.title: Queen-Sized Stomach

15425.title: Continuing On with the Comics Scenario

info.brief_description: An interactive story about tiny or shrunken shotas.
info.description:
Re-written with permission by cosmicdonut a.k.a. ButterBazooka, the original author.

You are a tiny boy, either shrunken by circumstances, born tiny, or transported in another universe, all cases surrounded by giantesses of every kind. As either an original character from all different reaches of visual media, you play the part of a shota as he goes through his life surrounded by giantesses of all kinds, who are either loving, maternal, playful, or cruel.

Rules:
No giant males
No tiny females
No gore
No digestion
No scat or piss content (but full tour is encouraged)
No sex
No unbirth
No killing the main character
The main character must be less than 15 years old.
